level.heading: Grounds.
level.text: The Mayor may commence a proceeding under § 29-106.02 to dissolve a domestic filing entity administratively if the entity does not:
Pay any fee or penalty required to be paid to the Mayor not later than 5 months after it is due;
Deliver a biennial report to the Mayor not later than 5 months after it is due; or
Have a registered agent in the District for 60 days.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 29-106.02, § 29-610.01, and § 29-1208.01.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 deleted "tax"' following "fee" in (a); and substituted "5 months" for "6 months" in (b).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
